events.title: Equatorial Guinea vs Algeria - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
events.desc: Ibrahim Maza has completed the most dribbles  and created the joint-most chances  for Algeria at the 2025 CAF Africa Cup of Nations. If he plays in this match, he’ll be the first player under the age of 21 to appear in all three group stage games for Algeria in a single edition since Nabil Bentaleb in 2015. Iban Salvador is Equatorial Guinea’s top appearance maker  at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations, but is currently on his longest run of games in the competition without a goal or assist. He hasn’t been involved in a goal since MD1 of the 2023 edition, netting his side’s only goal in a 1-1 draw with Nigeria.

events.title: Poitiers vs Tourcoing - Marmara Spike ligue Volleyball - 2025
events.desc: France’s top men’s volleyball competition, the LNV Ligue A Masculine (Marmara SpikeLigue), delivers a season of elite clubs battling through a home-and-away league before the playoffs. Expect big serving, quick middle attacks, and high-level defense as teams chase points, seeding and the national title in a prime-time French showcase.

events.title: Manchester United vs. Newcastle United - English Premier League 2025/2026
events.desc: Manchester United have lost four of their last five Premier League games against Newcastle, as many as they had in their previous 38 against the Magpies. Newcastle did the league double over Manchester United last season, including a 2-0 win in this exact fixture. They’ve not won consecutive visits to Old Trafford since March 1935, while they last won three in a row against the Red Devils in January 1922.

events.title: Benin vs Senegal - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
events.desc: Benin and Senegal are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Their previous encounter came in the quarter-finals of the 2019 edition – Senegal won 1-0. Benin have lost six of their last seven matches against Senegal in all competitions, losing 1-0 most recently in a friendly in March 2024 via a Sadio Mané penalty.

events.title: Liverpool vs Leeds United - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19
events.desc: Liverpool have scored 19 goals in their last five Premier League matches against Leeds, although they let a 2-0 lead slip to draw 3-3 at Elland Road in December, their highest scoring draw ever with the Whites. Leeds won 2-1 in their last away league game against Liverpool in October 2022. They’ve never won consecutive visits to the Reds in their league history.

events.title: Levante vs Real Sociedad - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 17
events.desc: Real Madrid have won seven of their last 11 LaLiga clashes with Barcelona, achieving the same number of victories as in their previous 29 ElClásico meetings in the competition. FC Barcelona have won their last four matches against Real Madrid in all competitions and have the chance to achieve five consecutive victories for the second time in the history of El Clásico, following those achieved between 2008 and 2010 under Josep Guardiola.

events.title: Arsenal  vs Aston Villa - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 19 - Mini Match
events.desc: Arsenal have lost three of their last five Premier League matches against Aston Villa  and could see Villa complete a league double over them for the third time in six seasons, something they’d done so just once previously in the competition beforehand, in 1992-93. Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09.

events.title: Sheffield United vs Leicester City - EFL - English Football League  SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
events.desc: Sheffield United have lost each of their last three home league games against Leicester City, their worst home losing run against the Foxes. Leicester City were beaten 3-2 by Sheffield United at the King Power earlier this season and could lose home and away to the Blades in a league campaign for the first time since 2007-08.

events.title: Sudan vs Brukina faso - African Cup of Nations - Morocco 2025
events.desc: Sudan and Burkina Faso are meeting for the second time at the CAF Africa Cup of Nations. Their previous encounter came in the group stages of the 2012 edition – Sudan won 2-1. Sudan have won their final group stage match in one of their previous five CAF Africa Cup of Nations tournaments, though that win came against Burkina Faso in 2012.

events.title: Blackburn Rovers vs Wrexham - EFL - English Football League  SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
events.desc: This will be the first time Blackburn are hosting Wrexham at Ewood Park in a league fixture since October 1981, a 0-0 draw under Bobby Saxton. Wrexham have lost only one of their last 14 league meetings with Blackburn Rovers, though 10 of those have ended level, including the reverse meeting this season in Wales.
